dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HRES 270 IH: Permitting official photographs of the House of Representatives to be taken while the House is in actual session on a date designated by the Speaker.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Miller of Michigan submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: Permitting official photographs of the House of Representatives to be taken while the House is in actual session on a date designated by the Speaker.

section.text: That on such date as the Speaker of the House of Representatives may designate, official photographs of the House may be taken while the House is in actual session. Payment for the costs associated with taking, preparing, and distributing such photographs may be made from the applicable accounts of the House of Representatives.
